TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IDynamicFeatureManager

Docs.summary: Used to access the variants of a dynamic feature.

Docs.param: The cancellation token to cancel the operation.
Docs.summary: Retrieves a list of dynamic feature names registered in the feature manager.
Docs.returns: An enumerator which provides asynchronous iteration over the dynamic feature names registered in the feature manager.

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance valuetype System.Threading.Tasks.ValueTask`1<!!T> GetVariantAsync<T, TContext>(string dynamicFeature, !!TContext context, valuetype System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken) cil managed
Public Function GetVariantAsync(Of T, TContext) (dynamicFeature As String, context As TContext, Optional cancellationToken As CancellationToken = Nothing) As ValueTask(Of T)
abstract member GetVariantAsync : string * 'Context * System.Threading.CancellationToken -> System.Threading.Tasks.ValueTask<'T>

Docs.typeparam: The type that the feature variant's configuration should be bound to.
The type of the context being provided to the dynamic feature manager for use during the process of choosing which variant to use.
Docs.param: The name of the dynamic feature.
A context providing information that can be used to evaluate which variant should be used for the dynamic feature.
The cancellation token to cancel the operation.
Docs.summary: Retrieves a typed representation of the feature variant that should be used for a given dynamic feature.
Docs.returns: A typed representation of the feature variant's configuration that should be used for a given feature.
